txt.en: The Haban'akkâ of Thráin has a great need for wood, both fallen branches and wood cut by the Orcs, that the fires of Amdân might remain lit.
Thorin can be found at Amdân.\n\nYou have collected a great deal of wood. You should deliver the wood to Thorin.
'A fine haul, my friend. The fires of Amdân will burn brightly tonight!'
Cut wood and fallen branches can be found in the forests outside of Amdân.\n\nThorin has asked you to gather wood for the Haban'akkâ of Thráin.
Deliver the wood to Thorin at Amdân

'Do you feel that, Hermáth? The fires must be stoked or the cold of Azanulbizar will overwhelm us!

'Our supply of wood at Amdân has grown thin, but the forests beyond these walls are still rife with trees and wood cut by the Orcs. Better we have it than them anyway!

'Would you aid the Haban'akkâ and gather wood for us?'
